MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL22 and LL29 postcode areas of Abergele and Colwyn Bay, affecting properties in Dolwen, Llanelian and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required to locate and repair the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.54PM on 26th December 2020.
